long_description: Built for comfort during yoga, the REI Sariska Sleeveless T-shirt offers comfortable fabric for a full range of motion. Specialized fabric mix offers the perfect balance of natural comfort, easy care and style. Tonal stitching and raw-edge styling. The REI Sariska Sleeveless T-shirt offers an active fit.
short_description: Built for comfort during yoga, the REI Sariska Sleeveless T-shirt offers comfortable fabric for a full range of motion.
